sub. Thanks for this video. ﻿

comments.author: djgoofyd

comments.text:
seriously...what's going on with brasil ? Bob Burnquist is the most insane 
skateboarder of all times. Dude started for NOTHING and look at him now. 
Then you have Luan,Rodrigo TX and buuuunch of other amazing skateboarder. 
Then you have Anderson Silva,one of the best if not the best MMA fighter of 
all times. Then you come to basketball and you find Oscar Schmidt who is 
the greatest scorer in the international basketball and there is no doubt 
in my mind that he would be a NBA legend if he ever had a chance to come 
over. Just take a look what he does to USA team in the Olyimps. Around 50 
points. We don't even have to talk about football ( soccer ). Those are 
things I'm interested in and every time there is some crazy guy from 
brasil.﻿
